headline: Ubumwe bwa Afrika - AU - bwahagaritse igihugu ca Guinea kubera kudeta
text: Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Afrika, canke AU, ryahagaritse mu banyamuryago igihugu ca Guinea nyuma y'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi nk'uko bigaragara mu butumwa bwa twitter. Prezida Alpha Condé yatembagajwe n'umugwi w'abasirikare bayobowe na Col Mamady Doumbouya ku munsi wa Mungu uheruka. Iyo kudeta yariyamirijwe n'abarongozi b'akarere co kimwe n'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU hamwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Ishirahamwe ry'akarere Ecowas ryahagaritse Guinea kuwa gatatu nayo abashikiranganji bajejwe imigenderare bo mu karere k'uburengero bwa Afrika bakaba barashitse i Conakry ngo baganire n'abatembagaje ubutegetsi. Abariko abarongozi ba gisirikare bakirijwe impundu n'isinzi ry'abantu mu mabarabara ku murwa mukuru Conakry. Benshi bavuga yuko bari baraseserejwe na Prezida Condé, yari mu kiringo kigira gatatu c'ubutegetsi, bakidogera kandi igiturire, ubutunzi bwifashe nabi hamwe n'intwaro mbi.

headline: Lalibela- Ethiopia: Inyeshamba za Tigray ntizumva akamo ko kuva mu gisagara zafashe muri Amhara
text: Inyeshamba zo muri Tigray banse kwumvira akamo ka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko kuva mu ntara zihana urubibe n'iyabo, umunsi umwe inyuma y'aho zifatiye ikibanza kiri mu mirage y'isi ya ONU mu ntara ya Amhara. Abo bagwanya reta ya Ethiopia bo mu ntara ya Tigray ku wa kane  bigaruriye igisagara ca Lalibela, umurage w'isi wa Unesco mu ntara ya Amhara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Lalibela, ahabarizwa amasengero yo mu kinjana ca 13 asaruwe mu mabuye, ni ikibanza cerenda ku bakristu b'aba Othodoxe baharurwa muri za miriyoni. Abahaba bari bamaze igihe bahunga umusugerezo w'inyeshamba, nk'uko abategetsi b'aho babibwiye BBC. Abantu ibihumbi baramaze kwicwa kuva intambara yadutse mu kwezi kwa 11. Ubu intambara iriko irakwira mu ntara za Amhara na Afar, iyindi ntara ihana urubibe na Tigray. Abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo baramaze guteshwa izabo. Zaba inyeshamba za Tigray, zaba n'ingabo za reta mpuzantara ya Ethiopia n'abazishigikiye, izo mpande zompi ziraregwa ibikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara. Icegera c'umukuru w'igisagara ca Lalibela, Mandefro Tadesse, yabwiye BBC ko igisigara kigenzurwa n'inyeshamba zo muri Tigray. Yavuze ko ata rusasu rwigeze ruraswa, ariko ko abanyagihugu bariko barahunga igisagara kandi ko afise amakenga y'ayo masengero mbonekarimwe. Hari amasezengero 11 yasaruwe mu masenga y'amabuye mu binjana vya 12 na 13. Yubatswe nk'ayo gusubirira Ihanga Ryeranda, abakora urugendo rweranda batashobora gushikamwo ico gihe. Mandefro yavuze ati: "Uwu n'umurage w'isi, kandi duteregerezwa gufashanya kugirango iryo tunga rikingirwe." Iyo ntambara iriko irakwira izindi ntara ikurikiye ukwigarurira uturere inyeshamba za Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) zagize mu kwezi ka gatandatu, harimwo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara ya Tigray Mekelle inyuma y'aho ingabo za Ethiopia zihaviriye  hanyuma zigantangaza zonyene ihagarikwa ry'intambara. TPLF niyo yari irongoye reta y'intara ya Tigray gushika yirukanywe n'ingabo za Ethiopia mu kwezi kwa 11. Reta ya Ethiopia yayise umugwi w'iterabwoba. Ariko izo nyeshamba zivuga ko arizo reta yemewe y'intara ya Tigray. Muri iyi ndwi, umu jenerari wo muri izo nyeshamba yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise intumbero yo kugondoza reta kuvanaho ukwugarana iyo ntara no kwemera inyishu ya poritike  kuri ico kibazo. Reta irahakana kuba yarugaranye iyo ntara kandi ivuga ko ata biganiro bizoba. Ariko kubona TPLF igeze muri Amhara na Afar vyatumye amakungu anegura ibiriko biraba, ONU na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bakaba basavye impande zose  guhagarika intambara. Reta ya Ethiopia ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 300 bateshejwe izabo muri Amhara na Afar. Hagati aho ONU yo ivuga ko amakamyo 175 arimwo imfashanyo yashitse muri Tigray. Ariko umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba indya kw'isi (PAM/WFP) yagabishije avuga ko hakenewe amakamyo arenga 100 ku munsi kugira hagarukirwe abantu baharurwa muri za miriyoni bakeneye imfashanyo. Abakozi b'amashirahamwe afasha bafise ikibazo co gushika mu  gice kinini ca Tigray kubera ikibazo c'umutekano n'izindi ntambanyi zo kuronka impusha.

headline: North Korea: umukuru w'iki gihugu Kim Jong-un aragabisha ko 'ibintu bitoroshe'
text: Umukuru wa Koreya y'Uburaruko Kim Jong-un asaba abanyagihugu ko bokwitegurira ibihe "bitoroshe", inyuma y'aho abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bagabishirije ko igihugu gihanzwe n'ubukene bw'imfungurwa mu gihe ubutunzi butifashe neza. Mw'ijambo yashikirije mw'ikoraniro ry'umugambwe, Kim yagereranije ingene ibintu vyifashe ubu n'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi. Koreya y'Uburaruko yarugaye imbibe zayo kubera ikiza karanda ca coronavirus. Vyatumye urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa ruhagarara mu gihe rwari bwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'ubutunzi bwaco. Ibi vyaje vyiyongera ku bihano vy'ubutunzi iki gihugu cafatiwe n'amakungu kubera umugambi waco wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara. Mu majambo atamenyerewe kuri we yo kwemera ko hari ibihe bigoye biri imbere, uyu mutegetsi yateye akamo ejo ku wa kane abategetsi b'umugambwe "kwitegurira urundi 'Rugendo Rutoroshe' (Arduous March/Marche Ardue)  kugira ngo abanyagihugu bacu baronke agahengwe n'akanya na gato". Ijambo  Arduous March (Urugendo Rutoroshe) ni ijambo risanzwe rikoreshwa n'abategetsi ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bagomba kuvuga urugamba rw'iki gihugu mu gihe c'amapfa yo mu myaka ya 1990 yihaye inkumbi, igihe icahoze ari Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'Abasoviyeti casambuka, Koreya y'Uburaruko igasigara yifumbereje. Bivugwa ko hafi abantu imiriyoni zitaru ari bo bapfuye muri ico gihe. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, Kim yaragabishije ko igihugu ciwe gihanzwe "n'ibihe bidasanzwe bitari bwigere bibaho" hamwe "n'ingorane nyinshi mu buryo butari bwigere bubaho". Haciye amezi atari make haba ukugabisha ko abanyagihugu ba Koreya y'Uburaruko bari mu ngorane. Amakuru avuga ivy'ubuzima bugoye asa n'ayava cane cane mu bisagara biri hafi y'urubibe iki gihugu gihana n'Ubushinwa, aho abatari bake bari babeshejweho n'urudandaza rwa magendo. Igiciro c'ibigori, imfungurwa nyamukuru ku banyagihugu batari bake ba Koreya y'Uburaruko baba mu misozi, kivugwa ko caduze cane gushika n'aho ikiro kimwe c'ibigori cagurwa igiciro kirenga umushahara w'ukwezi. Lina Yoon, umushakashatsi mw'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch, mu cegeranyo giheruka asubiramwo ibivugwa n'abantu atavuze umwidondoro, yavuze ko "haheze hafi amezi abiri bisa n'uko ata mfungurwa zinjira mu gihugu zivuye mu Bushinwa". "Hari benshi basigaye babeshejweho no gusegerereza, abantu bamwe barapfuye bishwe n'inzara mu karere k'umupaka, kandi nta sabune, nta muti w'amenyo, canke amabeteri". Mu kwezi guheze, itumwa idasanzwe ya ONU mu murwi wa Koreya y'Uburaruko ujejwe agateka ka zina muntu, Tomás Ojea Quintana, yasohoye icegeranyo agabisha ko "hari ikibazo gikomeye c'ubukene bw'imfungurwa" cariko gitera indwara z'ugufungura nabi n'inzara. "Hari amakuru avuga ko hari abapfuye bahitanywe na kigoyi, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abana n'abatama basigaye babeshejweho n'ugusegerereza vyiyongereye, kubera imiryango yabo itagishoboye kubatunga". Kubera iki Koreya y'Uburaruko iri mu bibazo? Ubutunzi bwa Koreya y'Uburaruko buri mu butunzi bwugaranywe cane kw'isi kandi buvugwa ko budahagaze neza, ni mu gihe busanzwe bugenzurwa bikomeye na reta. Ibikorwa vy'ugukomeza inzego za gisirikare n'iz'umutekano  bituma abanyagihugu basanzwe ba Koreya y'Uburaruko basigara bifumbereje. Ibihano vy'ubutunzi Koreya y'Uburaruko yafatiwe n'amakungu mu ntumbero yo kuyitera igitsure ngo ihebe umugambi wayo wo guhingura ubutare bw'ubumara vyarunyuye ibintu, co kimwe n'ingingo ya reta yo kwugara imbibe z'iki gihugu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira coronavirus. Kuva mu ntango za 2020, urudandaza hagati y'iki gihugu n'Ubushinwa, ari rwo buraro n'uburamuko bw'abanyagihugu, rwarahagaze. Koreya y'Uburaruko ivuga ko iyi ngingo yo kwugara imbibe yatumye Covid-19 idashika mu gihugu, n'aho abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafise amakenga kuri aya makuru.

headline: Ukraine - Russia: Umukenguzamateka wa US yarakaje Abarusiya inyuma y'aho asabiye ko Putin yicwa
text: Umukenguzamateka wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika asaba ko mu begereye Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya  hogira umwe muri bo amwica. Lindsey Graham avuga ko inzira yonyene yorangiza igitero Uburusiya bwakoze kuri Ukraine ari uko hoboneka umuntu "agakuraho uyu mugabo". Mw'itangazo yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, uyu mukenguzamateka wo mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika azwi ko atarya umunwa abaza nimba hatoboneka umuntu nka "Brutus" mu bantu ba Putin akamwirahira maze intambara igaca ihagarara. Aya majambo yarakaje uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika. Umukenguzamateka Graham aserukira intara ya Caroline du Sud, yanditse ati: "Woba ukoreye igikorwa kidasanzwe igihugu cawe n'isi yose". "Nta mu Brutus mu Burusiya? Nta Colonel Stauffenberg yoba ari mu gisirikare c'Uburusiya?" Brutus yari umunyaporitike w''icahoze ari ingoma y'Abaromani (Empire Romain/Roman Empire) yishe Julius Caesar, mu gihe Koroneri (Colonel) Claus von Stauffenberg wo mu gisirikare c'Ubudagi azwi cane ko yagerageje kwica Adolf Hitler mu 1944. Anatoly Antono aserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika avuga ko aya majambo "ari mabi cane kandi adashobora kwihanganirwa". Avuga ko ata "muntu yari yiteze urwanko nk'uru ku Burusiya muri Amerika". "Ni ibintu bitumvikana kwumva umukenguzamateka w'igihugu gishira imbere ko imico myiza ari yo ikwiye kuba 'inyenyeri' imurikira isi yose ashobora kwiyumvira ko iterabwoba ari yo nzira ya Washington yo gushika ku nyungu zayo ku rubuga mpuzamakungu". Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika ariyamiriza igitero c'Uburusiya kuri Ukraine mbere akaba yarafatiye ibihano abanyaporitike harimwo na Perezida Putin we nyene ubwiwe. Avuga ko Amerika izokingira ibihugu vya OTAN/NATO ariko akaba atazorungika ingabo muri Ukraine. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Maison Blanche/White House Jen Psaki yashimangiye ko amajambo ya  Graham adasigura na gato "aho reta ya Amerika ihagaze kandi ko atari amajambo ushobora kwumva mu kanwa k'umuntu uw'ari we wese akorera ubu butegetsi". Amajambo y'umukenguzamateka  Graham yashavuje kandi umuvugizi wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov. Igihe yatera akamo Abarusiya bose kuba umwe, yavuze ati: "Ni vyo, muri ino misi hari abantu bashobora kuvuga ibisunitswe n'impemu, si bose bashobora kugira ubwenge buri ku murongo".

headline: RD Congo: Intambara zasubiye kwaduka muri Minembwe, abantu bataye izabo
text: Mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo haravugwa ingwano zongeye kwaduka abantu benshi barata izabo bahunga. Gad Mukiza arongoye ako karere, avuga ko izo ntambara ziri hagati y'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho y'abanyamulenge ku ruhande rumwe, n'abo mu bwoko bw'Abafulero, Ababembe, n'Abanyindu ku rundi ruhande. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko zatanguriye muri Segiteri ya Tombwe iri muri 'Territoire ya Mwenga,  hari kw'igenekerezo rya ndwi uku kwezi kw'icenda. Ubu zikaba zasubiriye. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko Leta yarungitse ingabo muri ako karere kugira ngo zigarukane ituze, akibaza ko mu minsi mikeya abahunze bashobora gusubira mu zabo. Umunyamakuru wa Radio Televiziyo y'igihugu ca Congo, Mahoye Madiba Issa, ari mu karere ka Fizi, avuga ko izo ntambara zari zacureshe. Ibi vyabaye inyuma y'aho abategetsi batari bake, harimwo abaserukira MONUSCO bagendeye ako karere kugira ngo basukemwo mabisi. Ingwano ariko avuga ko zasubiriye busha muri iyi minsi n'abantu bakaba bataye ivyabo barahunga. Aka gace kama mu ruhagarara rushingiye ku moko kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko kuva kera ubutegetsi butashoboye guhagarika izo ntambara. Ati: "Ni Abanyamulenge barwana n'abaturanyi babo b'Abafulero, Ababembe n'Abanyindu. Ni ikibazo kigenda kigaruka kigafata isura y'amoko". "Ibintu bija kwunyurwa n'abanyepolitike babironderamwo inyungu zabo ari nabo bateranya abanyagihugu bafatiye ku moko". Iyo mirwano yasubiye kwaduka yatumye abantu ibihumbi bahungira mu bice bitandukanye vy'igihugu, abandi nabo bahungira mu bihugu bibanyi. Bwana Mukiza avuga ko ku mugwa mukuru wa komine Minembwe honyene habarizwa impunzi zingana na 49.500 ahanini bagizwe n'Abanyamulenge. Avuga ko hari n'igitigiri kitari gito kigizwe n'Abafulero, Ababembe  n'Abanyindu bahungiye mu karere ka Fizi. Avuga ko izo mpunzi ziri mu ngorane zikomeye kubera bigoye ko imfashanyo zibashikira kubera amabarabara atameze neza.

headline: Uganda Election 2021: Bariko baraharura amajwi y'amatora
text: Hatanguye guharurwa amajwi y'amatora yabaye kuri uyu wa kane muri Uganda mu mutekano wakajijwe cane kuva hasigaye isaha imwe ngo gutora birangire. Imodoka zzirimwo abasirikare zanyuragiye ku murwa mukuru Kampala, igipolisi naco n'banyagihugu bicungerera umutekano bakaba bariko barakizura. Mu bibanza bimwe bimwe gutira kwabandanije inyuma y'isaha ico gikorwa categerezwa  gugararariko. Amategeko agenga gutora avuga ko abantu bose basanzwe  ku mirongo barekuriwe gutora inyuna y'isaha yo guhagarika ico gikorwa. Prezida Yoweri Museveni amaze imyaka 35 atwara Uganda arondera ikindi kiringo kigira gatandatu c'ubutegetsi. Museveni w'imyaka 76 ahiganwa n'abandi 10, ukomeye cane muri bo akaba ari Robert Kyagulanyi azwi cane nka Boby Wine, umuririmvyi n'umunyepolitike w'imyaka 38. Imyiyamamazo yaranzwe n'intureka irimwo n'ubwicanyi vyatose cane cane abatavuga rumwe na reta. Ku munsi w'amatora ariko  ahanini nta ngorane z'umutekano zavuzwe. Ivyavuye mu matora bizomenyeshwa ku wa gatandatu. Internet n'imbuga hwaniro   vyarahagaritswe. N'uburyo bwo guhanahana amafaranga ku buhinga bushasha ntibwakora.

headline: Centrafrique: UN yisubije igisagara cari cafashwe n'abagwanyi
text: Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU rivuga ko ryisubije igisagara ca Bambari co muri Republika ya Centrafrique (CAR) cari casubiye kwigarurirwa n'abagwanyi ku musi wa kabiri. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ko ingabo zagiye kugarukana amahoro hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano b'ico gihugu ari bo bahagenzura, abitwaje ibigwanisho bakaba bahungiye mw'ishamba. Yavuze ko abasivire bari bahunze intambara batanguye kugaruka. Bitegekanijwe ko haba amatora rusangi muri ico gihugu ca Centrafrique ku musi w'Imana. Reta yagirije uwahoze arongoye ico gihugu, Francois Bozize, ko yishize hamwe n'imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho mu ntumbero yo gutembagaza ubutegetsi - ivyo we ahakana. Uburusiya n'Urwanda vyararungitse abandi basirikare baharurwa mu majana mu gufata mu mugongo reta, mu gihe abitwaje ibigwanisho bariko baragerageza gushika ku mugwa mukuru Bangui.

headline: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
text: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

headline: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
text: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

headline: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
text: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

headline: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
text: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

headline: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
text: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

headline: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
text: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

headline: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
text: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

headline: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
text: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

headline: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
text: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

headline: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
text: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

headline: Umurwi Man Utd uvuga ko 'ubabajwe cane' n'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe Paul Pogba
text: Manchester United ivuga ko iriko "irakora amatohoza kugira imenye" abakwiragije ku mbuga hwaniro inzandiko z'amacakubiri y'urukoba ku mukinyi Paul Pogba akina hagati muri uwo murwi. Pogba w'imyaka 26 yahushije penalty ejo ku wa mbere mu rukino rwahuje Man United na Wolves, ruza kurangira ari igitsindo kimwe ku kindi. Agize umukinyi wa gatatu mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa akorewe ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga hwaniro kubera yahushije penalty, inyuma ya Yakou Méïté wa Reading na Tammy Abraham wa Chelsea. Umurwi wa Man United uvuga ko "ubabajwe cane" n'iryo tyozwa kandi ko "uryiyamirije wivuye inyuma". Mw'itangazo wasohoye uvuga uti: "Abo bantu banditse ivyo baciye kubiri n'akaranga k'umurwi wacu rurangiranwa kandi urahimiriza abakunzi bawo ko bokwiyamiriza ivyo bintu ku mbuga hwaniro ari benshi". "Manchester United ntishobora kwihanganira na gato amacakubiri canke ikumira iryo ari ryo ryose kandi itanguje isekeza #AllRedAllEqual initiative rizomara igihe kirekire ry'ukurwanya ako kabi". "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira tumenye abo bose babigizemwo uruhara twongere dufate n'ingingo ruhasha zose zishoboka. Dusavye kandi n'amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gufata ingingo muri iyi ntumbero". Ku munsi wa Mungu, umusatirizi Yakou Méïté wa Reading yariyamirije ityoza rifatiye ku rukoba yakorewe ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho ahushirije penalty. Uyo mukinyi akomoka muri Côte d'Ivoire w'imyaka 23, yinjiye ku munota wa 80 igihe Reading yahura na Cardiff aca ahusha penalty ku munota wa 91. Mu ndwi iheze, Chelsea yariyamirije "inzandiko z'urwanko" ku mukinyi Tammy Abraham inyuma y'aho uyo murwi utsindiwe na Liverpool mu rukino rwa nyuma rwa Super Cup. Umumenyereza wa Chelsea  Frank Lampard avuga ko "yababajwe cane" n'ityozwa ry'uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 21. Asaba amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ahagarike ingeso y'ukwifatira mu gahanga abakinyi. Eka n'abandi bakunzi ntibatevye kwiyamiriza ama tweet yarimwo amajambo y'amacakubiri yanditswe kuri Pogba - yari yaronse penalty kw'ikosa yakorewe mu nyuma arayihusha - ejo ku munsi wa mbere. Ama tweets amwe amwe yarafuswe, mu gihe n'ama "comptes" atari make nayo nyene yasa n'ayari yafuswe. Amategeko ngenderwako ya Twitter avuga ko "ishobora gufata ingingo ku nyifato y'ugutyoza abantu". Mu kwezi kw'indwi, ishirahamwe rirwanya amacakubiri y'urukoba, Kick It Out, ryarasohoye icegeranyo cerekana ko amakuru ajanye n'amacakubiri y'urukoba yiyongereye ku bice 43% mu mwaka w'inkino uheze, aho yabonetse incuro 274 ugereranije na 192 yari yabonetse mu mwaka waheruka.

headline: Mason Greenwood: Umusatiziri wa Manchetser United yarekuwe vy’agateganyo
text: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Mason Greenwood yarekuwe vy'agateganyo inyuma yo guhagarikwa yagirizwa gufata ku nguvu umugore. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yahagaritswe kandi ku wa Mungu yagirizwa ihohotera, inyuma y'uko yagirijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu nyuma yahagaritswe yagirizwa ko yafashe umuntu ku nguvu mbere agatera ubwoba bwo kwica umuntu ku wa kabiri. Manchester United yari yamenyesheje ko uyu musatirizi atari gusubira mu myimenyerezo gushika hafashwe izindi ngingo. Igipolisi ca Greater Manchester cavuze ko Greenwood yahagaritswe inyuma y'aho kimenyeye ko "hari amashusho n'amareresi yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'umugore yavuga ihohotera yakorewe". Iki gipolisi kivuga ko abacamanza bari bategetse ko aguma mu gasho gushika ku wa gatatu ariko ubu yarekuwe vy'agateganyo mu gihe ayandi matohoza akibandanya. Inyuma y'aho uyu musatirizi ahagarikiwe, ikigo EA Sports gikora udukino two kuri videwo cavuze ko Greenwood yakuwe mu dukino twa FIFA. Cavuze ko yari yakuwe mu gakino kitwa FIFA 22 aca akurwa no ku rutonde rw'abo gikoresha mu gakino FIFA Ultimate Team hamwe na Ultimate Draft. Ikompanyi ikora ivyambarwa vy'abanonotsi, Nike, yari yamenyesheje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire n'uyu mukinyi. Umuvugizi wayo yavuze ati: "Turababajwe cane n'ibi birego kandi tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo". Amaze gutangura gukinira Manchester United mu kwa gatatu 2019, Greenwood yarateye igikumu mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze ku masezerano yo gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, amaze gutera intambwe nk'umwe mu bigishijwe n'uyu murwi. Ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wavuze ko "udashobora kwihanganira ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" kandi ko wari wamenyeshejwe ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa, ariko ko ataco wari kuvuga imbere y'uko "ukuri kumenyekana ku vyabaye". Mu rindi tangazo ryasohowe ejo ku wa kabiri, uyu murwi washimangiye ko wiyamiriza wivuye inyuma ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose.

headline: Zambia yahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe na Afrika y’Epfo kubera ibitero ku banyamahanga
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Zambia (FAZ) ryahagaritse urukino rwa kivandimwe rwoyihuje na Afrika y'Epfo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ku mugwa mukuru Lusaka. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'ibitero vyakozwe ku banyamahanga mu gihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo. Abanyagihugu ba Zambia baciye ku mbuga hwaniro barasavye ko iryo shirahamwe FAZ rihagarika urukino hagati ya Chipolopolo na Bafana Bafana nk'ukwerekana akababaro. Umukuru wa FAZ Adrian Kashala yemeje iyo ngingo, yongera ko y'uko urwo rukino rwungururijwe ku rindi genekerezo ritamenyekanye, inyuma y'aho babonaniye n'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika y'Epfo, SAFA. Muri uwo mwanya nyene, leta ya Zambia yahanuye abadereva b'amakamyo ko bohagarika ingendo zabo muri Afrika y'Epfo gushika umutekano ugarutse muri ico gihugu. Umushikiranganji w'ukwunguruza abantu n'ibintu, Mutotwe Kafwaya, yasavye abadereva basanzwe bari muri Afrika y'Epfo ko bobika amamodoka yabo ahantu hatekanye gushika umutekano ugarutse. Ivyo bitero ku banyamahanga vyasubiye kwiyongera vyatumye amaduka y'abanyamahanga asahurwa urukombamazi, amamodoka araturirwa, eka n'amakamyo yagendeshwa n'abanyamahanga araterwa. Eka n'ishirahamwe rijejwe iterambere rihuza ibihugu vyo mu karere ka Afrika y'Ubumanuko, SADC, ririyamiriza ivyo bitero. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'iryo shirahamwe,  Stergomena Tax, avuga ko SADC iteye ivyatsi ubwo bukozi bw'ikibi butagira izina bukorerwa abanyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo, agasaba ko ico kibazo cotorerwa inyishu irama.

headline: Novak Djokovic: Singwanya kwicandagisha ariko nemeye guheba ibikombe haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco
text: Novak Djokovic  avuga ko yopfuma aheba gukinira ibikombe vyo muri kazoza haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid -19. Mu kiganiro cihariye na BBC, yavuze ko ataho ahuriye n'abagwanya incanco, ariko ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'umuntu bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka. Djokovic yabajijwe niba yohitamwo guheba amahiganwa nka Wimbledon na French Open haguheba aho  ahagaze ku vyerekeye incanco. Nawe ati : "Ego, ico nico kiguzi niteguriye kuriha." Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Grand Slam incuro 20 yarirukanywe muri Australia mu kwezi guheze reta y'ico gihugu imaze gufuta  visa yiwe ku mpari zijanye no kuba aticandagishije. Djokovic, asanzwe ariwe wa mbere kw'isi  muri tennis y'abagabo, avuga ko yari yarasonse uruhusha rudasansazwe rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open kubera yari amaze iminsi aheruka gukira Covid-19. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira , Alex Hawke, ubwiwe yaciye afuta visa y'uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34, ku mvo z'uko kuba ari muri Australia vyari gushobora "kugumura" bigaha intege  agatima ko kugwanya incanco. Yabwiye BBC ati "Sinigeze ngwanya incanco", yemeza ko yatewe incanco akiri umwana, "ariko namye nshigikira uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ico ushira mu mubiri wawe." Mu kiganiro caciye irya n'ino ibibazo vyinshi, ica mbere kuva apfungiwe i Melbourne muri Nzero (ukwa 1), Djokovic yisiguye ku bijanyue n'igihe yatorwa ko yanduye umugera wa corona muri Kigarama (ukwa 12) hamwe n'ingene abona incanco. Djokovic  yavuze ko yizeye ko ingingo zijanye n'ukwicandagisha ku mahiganwa amwe amwe zizohinduka,  anavuga ko yizeye ko "ashobora kuzokina iyindi myaka myinshi". Ariko yanemeje kandi ko yiteguriye guheba amahirwe yo kuba umugabo wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri tennis kubera uko yumva ibintu. Umukeba wa Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, amaze gutahukana intsinzi 21 za Grand Slam, gutyo akaba ariwe mugabo wa mbere afise intsinzi nyinshi za wenyene kurusha abandi bose. Abajijwe igituma, yishuye ati: "Kubera ica ngenderwako mu gufata ingingo ku vyerekeye umubiri wanje kirakomeye kuruta igikombe canke ikindi kintu ico arico cose. Jewe ngerageza gukurikiza ivyo umubiri wanje ushaka uko bishoboka kwose." Djokovic  yavuze ko yamye ari umuntu ashira imbere "kumererwa neza, amagara, kurya neza," kandi ko ingingo yiwe ku ruhande rumwe yatumwe n'ingaruka nziza ibintu bimwe bimwe nko guhindura ingene arya n'ingene aryama, vyagize ku bushobozi bwiwe nk'umunonotsi. Avuga ko aguma "ari maso" ku bijanye no gushobora kuzokwicandagisha muri kazoza "kuko  turiko turagerageza gutora, twese hamwe, inyishu nziza ishoboka yo kurangiza Covid". "Sinigeze ngwanya kwicandagisha. Ndatahura ko, kw'isi yose, abantu bose bariko baragerageza gushira inguvu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, kandi bizeye ko ugiye kurangira vuba." Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Fergus Walsh Incanco (doses) zirenga  miriyaridi 10 za Covid ziramaze guterwa kandi abantu hafi batandatu kuri 10 kw'isi yose baramaze kuronka nibura rumwe. N'ukuvuga ko hari amakuru menshi. Nko ku yindi miti myinshi, incanco za Covid zirashobora kugira ingaruka, ariko integuro yazo ku mutekano ni nziza cane. Zimaze gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu badaharurwa, zakingiye abantu kurwara bakaremba, kandi zishobora kubuza kurwara Covid igihe kirekire. Izi ncanco zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane, ubundi gukora urucanco bikunze guteba kubera ibibazo vyo kuronka uburyo. Abahinga bagize uruhara mu kugerageza incanco za Covid, hamwe n'inzego zijejwe  kuzemeza, bavuga ko ataco birengangije mu bijanye n'umutekano wazo. Hari ingaruka zishika gake cane zibonekeje hagitangura gutangwa izo ncanco ku bantu ama miriyoni, ari naco gituma abagenzura bama bariko barabikurikirana indwi ku ndwi. Biragoye kumenya ibindi Djokovic akeneye canke yifuza kumenya.  Avuga ko adafise amakuru akwiye ku "rucanco" nk'uko umenga hari rumwe gusa. Hari nyinshi.  Nk'umunonotsi,  ivyago vyo kurwara Covid ni bike. Ariko ntibingana n'ubusa. Kanatsinda amaze kuyirwara kabiri. Uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kwemererwa kwinjira muri Australia kandi aticandagishije rwasabwe hatavuzwe uwurusavye uwari we, kandi rwemewe n'imigwi y'inzego zibiri zigenga zo muri Australia. Ariko hari n'urundi rupapuro rw'urugendo, rwagiyemwo ikosa. Djokovic aremera ko "vy'ukuri, iryo kosa ku rupapuro rwo gusaba visa ntiryakozwe ibigarankana." "Ryaremewe kandi riremezwa na sentare y'igihugu mbere n'umushikiranganji ubwiwe mu bushikiranganji bw'abinjira n'abasohoka muri Australia. "Ico abantu bashobora kuba batazi ni uko  ntirukanywe muri Australia ku mvo z'uko ntari naracandazwe, canke ko hari amategeko narenze canke ko nagize ikosa mu kwuzuza urupapuro rwo gusaba visa. Ivyo vyose vyaremejwe na sentare y'igihugu n'ubushikiranganji bw'abasohoka n'abinjira. "Igituma nirukanywe muri Australia n'uko umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira yakoresheje ububasha bwiwe mu gufuta visa yanje agendeye ku kwibaza ko nshobora guha intege abafise agatima ko kurwanya incanco mu gihugu canke mu gisagara, ivyo navyo nkaba ntavyemera na gato."

headline: BAL2022: Umugwi New Star usaba urundi rukino inyuma yo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa
text: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko Basketball mu Burundi FEBABU ryandikiye ishirahamwe ry'isi yose ry'urwo rukino FIBA risaba ko umugwi wa New Star urenganurwa ku ngingo wafatiwe zo kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa kubera Covid. Umugwi wa New Star wahagaritswe mw'ihiganwa inyuma yo gusanga abakinyi bane b'uwo mugwi n'ababaherekeje babiri bafise umugera wa Covid-19. Mu rwandiko rwa FIBA ruvuga ko uwabanduje ari umukinyi yitwa Brian Kavakure. FIBA ikavuga ko, hishimikijwe amategeko y'iryo shirahamwe, abakinyi bose bategerezwa guca bashirwa mu kibanza ca bonyene. Banditse kandi ko "kubera abanduye bashobora kwanduza abandi ku kibuga, hafashwe ingingo ko umugwi wa New Star wirukanywe mw'ihiganwa." Urukino rwategerezwa guhuza New Star na Cape Town Tigers rwaciye rufutwa, New Star ica itsindwa impaga. Baba abarongozi b'umugwi wa New Star canke ba FEBABU ishavu riraniga, bavuga ko barenganijwe. Bagiriza umugwi wa Afrika y'Epfo, Cape Town Tigers, wari watsinzwe na New Star mu rukino rwa mbere ko ari wo woba uri inyuma y'uko kwirukanwa mw'ihiganwa. New Star ntihakana ko ari abakinyi bayo basanganywe Covid ariko bagatangazwa n'uko umugwi wa Cape Town Tigers na wo wasanganywe umukinyi afise uwo mugera ata ngingo n'imwe wafatiwe. Aho ni mu gihe ari wo bategerezwa gutana mu mitwe. FEBABU iranibaza iti: "Bigenda gute ngo FIBA ivuge ko umukinyi wacu Brian Kavakure ari we yanduje abandi ariko akaba ata Covid bamusanganye, mbere akanahabwa n'uburenganzira bwo gutahana n'abandi mu Burundi?" Ikindi ishirahamwe rya Basketball mu Burundi rivuga n'ingene umugwi bari baraye bakinye na New Star wa Cobra Sport bawuretse urabandanya ihiganwa. New Star kandi, n'aho yari ibuze abakinyi bakomakomeye, yaratonze ku kibuga kugira bakine na Cape Town Tigers, ariko abo na bo ntibitaba. Ivyo ngo bikagaragara ko ari ivyari vyateguwe ko babakubita impaga babagiriza ko bamwe muri bo batowe Covid. Kubera izo mvo zose, FEBABU isaba ko New star yobandanya ihiganwa hisunzwe amanota iyo migwi ibiri yari imaze kuronka, canke hatunganywe urundi rukino rwobahuriza ku kindi kibuga.

headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Diaz, Ronaldo, Longstaff, Origi, Cantwell, Coutinho, Traore
text: Liverpool iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Porto, umunya Colombia  Luis Diaz, 24, ku miriyoni zirenga 81 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunya-Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo, 36, ashobora kuva muri Manchester United mu ci riza mu gihe atokwishimira umumenyereza uyu murwi uzohitamwo burundu. (Star) Manchester United yemereye umukinyi wayo wo hagati Paul Pogba amasezerano mashasha y'igihe kirekire - ashobora kumuha umushahara w'ibihumbi birenga amajana 540 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi - kugira ngo uyu mufaransa w'imyaka 28 ntazohave agenda kuri gusa mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na'uyu murwi azoba arangiye.  (Sun) Newcastle yanse ivyo yemerewe na Everton ku mukinyi Sean Longstaff.  Uyu mwongereza w'imyaka 24 akina hagati azorangiza amasezerano afitaniye n'aba Magpies mu mpera z'iri higanwa ry'uno mwaka, bakaba bizeye ko bazokwumvikana ku masezerano mashasha.  (Shields Gazzette) Newcastle n'uwundi murwi wa Premier League nyene iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Norwich Todd Cantwell, 23. (Sky Sports) Leicester City n'iyindi mirwi itari mike ya Premier League izotegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni zababa 45 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika nimba ishaka kugura umusatirizi wa Club Bruges, Charles de Ketelaere, ariko yipfuza cane kwimukira muri Premier League muri uku kwa mbere. (Voetbal Nieuws - via Leicester Mercury) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yotira umusatirizi wa Manchester United umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, harimwo n'umugambi wo kuzoshobora kumugura burundu mu mpera z'iri higanwa.  (Sport - in Spanish) Newcastle nayo nyene iripfuza gutira Martial kugira ngo ashobore gusubirira umusatirizi Callum Wilson yavunitse. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Everton na Newcastle yahambije Arsenal mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya Brésil Bruno Guimaraes, 24, asanzwe akina hagati muri Lyon mu Bufaransa. headline: Mboma na Masilingi bo muri Namibia bompi ntawuzokwiruka 400m muri olympic kubera testosterone nyinshi
text: Umukobwa w'umuyabaga wo muri Namibia  Christine Mboma - yaciye umuhingo wa metero 400 wari umaze imyaka 30 - mu batarenza imyaka 20 ku wa gatatu - yavuye mu bazohiganwa kuri uwo mwanya mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo kuko basanze umubiri wiwe ufise inkabuzo/umusemburo kamere wa testosterone uri ku rugero rurenze urwemerwa n'urwego ruraba izo nkino kw'isi,  World Athletics. Umwanya wari wagizwe n'uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 Mboma ku wa gatatu mu gisagara co muri Pologne ca  Bydgoszcz waza ubigira ndwi mu myanya mito ku 400m wirutswe n'umugore gushika ubu - ukaba wamuha amahirwe yo kuronka umudari w'inzahabu kuri izo metero i Tokyo. Ariko komite ya olympic ya Namibia (NNOC - CGA) yemeje ko abo bakobwa bompi batazoshobora guhiganwa kuri izo metero kubera amategeko ya  World Athletics ku bagore bari mu mugwi w'abafise  "Differences of Sexual Development", canke DSD, inyuma yo gupimwa n'urwo rwego. NNOC -CGA yavuze mw'itangazo ko  "bikenewe cane ko abantu bumva ko abo banonotsi bompi atawari azi ko afise ico kibazo. Nta n'uwo mu muryango yari abizi, naho n'umumenyereza wabo canke NNOC -CGA." Mboma yari amaze umwaka atera imbere bigaragara, agumya asumvya aho yari amaze kugera, anaca imihigo mu gihugu,  ku mugabane mbere no kw'isi ku metero 400. Umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 48.54 -hafi ica cenda kuri cumi (9/10) wihuse kurusha umwanya wa mbere  mwiza wari uhari gushika ubu wagizwe n'umudagikazi wo mu buseruko  Gritt Breur mu 1991 - wari muto cane ku buryo ubwo nyene yaciye aba umwe mu bohiganiwe umudari w'inzahabu na cane ko muri iyo ndwi uwundi mukeba kuri izo metero, Salwa Eid Naser wo muri Bahrain, yari yafatiwe ibihano vy'imyaka ibiri kubera kurenga ku mategeko yo gufata imiti yongereza inguvu zo kwiruka. Ariko uko gutera imbere cane kwatumye World Athletics imukurikiranira hafi, ica isaba ko hasuzumwa  ibipimo vya mbere vyari vyakorewe muri Namibia. Ibindi bipimo vyaciye bikorwa mur iyi ndwi aho bompi Mboma na Masilingi bagirira imyimenyerero ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutariano Roma, ''inyishu ikaba yaje ivuga ko abo banonotsi bompi umubiri wabo usanzwe ufise inkabuzo kamere za testosterone zirenze urugero". Itangazo ry'urwego rwa Namibia rujejwe inkino za olympic rivuga ko "NNOC -CGA n'umuganga wacu aguma avugana n'umuganga wa World Athletics ku vyerekeye ibigiye gukurikira kuri abo banonostsi babiri." "Tuzokwihweza inkuru zose. Turizeye kazoza kabo nk'abanonostsi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Christine na Beatrice bompi bazoshobora guhiganwa ku metero 100 na 200. "Umumenyereza ariteguye kubandanya akorana n'abo bakobwa kuri izo metero mu gihe tukiraba ikigiye gukurikira." Mboma na Masilingi bompi bazohiganwa ubwa mbere mu nkino za olympic i Tokyo mu Buyapani, aho izo nkino zitegekanijwe hagati y'itariki 23 ukwezi kw'indwi n'itari 8 ukwezi kw'umunani. World Athletics irabuza abagore bari mu mugwi wa DSD guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1,6km) mu mugwi w'abagore kiretse babanje gufata imiti igabanya urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Ni co cakuye  umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya n'umunya-Kenya Margaret  Wambui mw'ihiganwa ku metero 800 mu  nkino za Tokyo. Uko ari batatu nibo bari baronse imidari kuri izo metero mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Francine Niyonsaba ubu azogeragaza amahirwe yiwe ku metero 5,000 mu gihe  Caster Semenya we vyamunaniye kuronka umwanya usabwa kugira aronke uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Tokyo. World Athletics ivuga ko urugero runini rw'iyo nkabuzo rwongereza  kutaruha no gukomera kw'imitsi bigaha amahirwe abafise ururi hejuru cane kurusha abandi. Caster Semenya amaze igihe  yarajanye urubanza muri sentare kugira iyo ngingo ivanweho, ubu akaba arugejeje muri sentare ya Buraya yubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu. Avuga ati: ''Iyo ngingo nta nsiguro igira. Nzoguma ngwanira uburenganzira bwanje."

headline: Icegeranyo kivuga ko Diego Maradona yapfuye kubera ugusamara kw'abaganga
text: Umurwi w'abahinga mu vyo buvuzi wemeje ko uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentine mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona "atitaweho kandi habaye urwangara" imbere 'yuko asandaba. Abashikirizamanza muri Argentina bari basavye uyo murwi gukora amatohoza ku bari bajejwe gukurikirana amagara ya Maradona inyuma y'aho apfiriye mu kw'icumi na rimwe umwaka uheze. Maradona yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima muhira iwe i Buenos Aires afise imyaka 60. Mu ntango z'ukwa cumi na rimwe yari yabazwe mu bwonko ikivyimba cari cavuye kw'ivura ry'amaraso, akaba yagomba abandanye avurwa ingaruka z'inzoga. Nk'umwe mu bakinyi babaye rurangiranwa mu bihe vyose, Maradona yahavuye agira ubuzima bubi bwaranzwe no kunywa ibiyayuramutwe n'inzoga nyinshi. Urupfu rwa Maradona yabaye kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina igihe iki gihugu gitahukana igikombe c'isi yose mw'ihiganwa mpuzamakungu ry'umupira w'amaguru  mu 1986, rwababaje abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi, bakaba bibajije vyinshi ku bijanye n'abari bajejwe kumuvura. Haciye imisi mike apfuye, abashikirizamanza baciye batangura amatohoza ku baganga n'abaforoma bari bajejwe kumuvura. Mu kwa gatatu, abo bashikirizamanza batumyeko abahinga 20 muvyo ubuvuzi  kugira ngo bihweze icatumye Maradona apfa bongere bihweze nimba harabaye urwangara. Ivyavuye mu matohoza y'abo bahinga vyatangajwe n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri Argentina ku wa gatanu. Mu cegeranyo c'impapuro 70, uyo murwi werekana ko Maradona yasinzikaye cane hafi amasaha 12 imbere y'uko apfa. Muri iki gihe, "ntiyakurikiranywe bikwiye", nk'uko iki cegeranyo kibivuga. Gisubiramwo ibiri muri ico cegeranyo, ikinyamakuru Clarin co muri Argentina kivuga ko uyo murwi wagiriza abaganga bari bajejwe kuvura Maradona "bamutanye wenyene" Abo bahinga bavuga ko Maradona yari gushobora kuronka amahirwe yo gukira iyo ajanwa kuvurirwa kw'ivuriro hakumugumiza muhira, nk'uko ico kinyamakuru kibivuga. Uyo murwi uvuga ko abari bajejwe kuvura Maradona batamuvuye neza kandi baranzwe n'urwangara, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters naryo ryaronse ico cegeranyo. Umuganga bwite wa Maradona Leopoldo Luque w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'uwari ajejwe gukurikirana ubuzima bwiwe bwo mu mutwe, bari mu baganga bariko barakorwako amatohoza n'aho bashikirizamanza. Umurwi w'abahinga washikirije icegeranyo cawo, hasigaye ko abashikirizamanza bafata ingingo ku bijanye no kurengutsa abagirizwa. Ikinyamakuru Clarin kivuga ko bimwe muvyo bashobora kwagirizwa harimwo ubwicanyi. Uru rupfu rwakozweko amatohoza inyuma y'uko babiri mu bakobwa ba Maradona bitwaye. Bavuze ko bagize amakenga ku kungene se wabo yakurikiranywe amaze kubagwa mu bwonko. Muganga Luque wewe nta caha camwagiriye. Arahakana ko ataruhara yabigizemwo. Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'abanyamakuru akorora amosozi mu kwa cumi na rimwe, Muganga Luque yararize, avuga ko yakoze uko ashoboye kugira arokore ubuzima bw'umugenzi wiwe. Uyu muganga yavuze ko yakoze "ivyo yari ashoboye vyose gushika aho ananirwa".

headline: Lionel Messi: Barça yipfuza kunagura umurwi ishingiye ku mukinyi wa mbere kw'isi
text: Barcelona iracipfuza ko yosubira kwiyubaka ishingiye kuri kizigenza wayo Lionel Messi, ubu abarongoye uyu murwi bakaba bariko baragerageza kumwumvisha ko yowugumamwo, nk'uko bivugwa na Ramon Planes ajejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Barça. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Argentine yaratangarije uyu murwi ko yipfuza kuwusezerera. Uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira umupira w'inzahabu incuro indwi zose niwe mukinyi wa mbere amaze gutsindira Barcelona ibitsindo vyinshi, bingana na 634. Planes ati: "Ivyabaye vyarabaye kandi intumbero yacu ni ukunagurira umurwi wacu ku mushinge w'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi". "Dushaka kwubaka uwundi murwi utsinda urongowe n'umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi, uwa mbere mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru kw'isi". "Barça na Leo ni nk'umugabo n'umugore, aho uruhande rumwe rwitangiye cane urundi, kandi bompi banezereje abakunzi. Nibaza ko kazoza ari keza. Ndafise viyizigiro". Messi - umukinyi amaze imyaka yose akina muri Barça - yipfuza kuja ahandi inyuma y'uko umwaka wose w'inkino urangiye ata gikombe na kimwe baronse, akamaramaza kakaba kabaye mu rukino rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ca Champions League rwagiye kurangira Bayern Munich yirahiye Barça ibitsindo 8-2. Amasezerano ya Messi na Barcelona azorangira mu 202, ariko umurwi umukeneye ukaba utegerezwa kumugura ku miliyoni 700. Planes ati: "Turakeneye abakinyi b'inararibonye nka Leo Messi, ariko kandi n'abakinyi b'integabizoza ku murwi. Turiko turita ku rutare kugira ngo imigenderanire hagati ya Messi na Barça ibandanye. Turiko turakora kugira ngo twumvishe Leo". "Barça yagiye yiyubaka incuro nyinshi muri kahise kandi yamye yivyukiranya ikaza ikomeye cane, rero muri kino gihe nivyo turimwo". Bamwe babona ko kugira ngo Messi ashobore kugondozwa ari uko umukuru wayo Josep Maria Bartomeu atanga imihoho, maze hakaba ayandi matora. Hagati aho, iki conyene gishobora kudatuma uyu murwi ugumana uyu mukinyi amaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espanye incuro cumi zose hamwe n'ihiganwa rya Bulaya (Champions League) incuro zine.

headline: Caster Semenya yise abarongozi ba 'athletisme' muri Africa ba 'niryo' ku ngingo ya sentare ya siporo.
text: Uwigeze gutwara umudari wa olempike incuro zibiri n'uwo ihiganwa ry'isi yose incuro zitatu, Caster Semenya, yise abategetsi ba Afrika muvyo kwinonora imitsi, ba "niryo" kuba barananiwe guhagarara bakagwanira abanonotsi b'abapfasoni bahanganye n'ikibazo co gukurwa mu mahiganwa. Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 31  yarakuwe ku rutonde rw'abahiganwa ku metero akunda gusiganwako 800 hisunzwe amategeko  agenga inkabuzo ya "testostérone" umuntu aba afise mu mubiri, y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Abanonotsi bafise inkabuzo nyinshi za "testostérone" basabwa gukoresha umuti mu kuzigabanya kugira bashobore guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1500. Semenya yagize ati: "Nibaza ko, kuri uyu musi, dufise abategetsi ba 'niryo'". "Kuri uyu mugabane, abantu baranumye. Sintahura igituma batavuga. Ntibagwanira abanonotsi babo. "Mutegerezwa guseruka mugakora, mukagwanira abanonotsi banyu, gutyo abanonotsi ba Afrika bazoba beza cane. Ubu uko bimeze birababaje." Igihe BBC Sport Africa yabaza Maboum Kalkaba, prezida w'urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika (CAA), ivyerekeye ivyo Semanya avuga, n'uko abategetsi barongoye ishirahamwe ryo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika bakoreye ibikwiye abo barongoye, yishuye ati: "Nimundeke, nta nyishu mfise". Abanonotsi benshi bo muri Afrika barakozweko n'iyo ngingo, harimwo umunonotsi w'umurundikazi yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino za olempike, Francine Niyonsaba, hamwe na mugenzi we wo muri Kenya bahiganwa ku metero 800. Mu mwaka uheze, abayabaga babiri bo muri Namibia, Christine Mboma na Beatrice Masilingi, barahatiwe kuva mw'ihiganwa rya metero 400, imbere y'imisi mike ngo habe inkino za olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo za testostérone. Bompi Mboma na Masilingi batinze bahiganwa mu metero 200 mu Buyapani, aho Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza wa mbere wa olempike w'ico gihugu. Ariko Semenya, ubu ahiganwa ku metero 5000, yaranebaguye ingene abategetsi b'ishirahamwe rya Afrika riraba abanonotsi bitwaye kuri ico kibazo c'abo bayabaga co kimwe n'"agacerere" ku ngingo yafashwe yo kubabuza guhiganwa muri rusangi. Uwo munye Afrika y'epfo yagize ati: "Igihe nari mfise imyaka 18, sinashobora kuvuga. Ubu ndakuze bikwiye, ndashobora kuvuga. "Nimwiyumvire ivyaciye mu mitwe y'iyo miyabaga. Nta co bashobora gukora, ariko abategetsi bariyicariye gusa binezerererwa gusa n'uturusho bafise, mu bibanza biberamwo amanama. Umuyobozi mukuru wa CAA, Lamine Faty yavuze ko Semenya "afise uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyo yiyumvira" kandi ko ibibazo ku ngingo zatumye bakurwa mw'ihiganwa vyashikirijwe n'iryo shirahamwe "kera cane" kandi ko vyaganiriweko mu misi ya vuba mu kanama ka CAA  mu nama yabereye muri Ile Maurice. Impari kw'itorwa ry'abagore bagira uruhara muri siporo zabaye nyinhsi, na cane cane zikaba zashimikiye ku banonotsi bameze nk'abagabo kandi ari abakobwa. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi, Seb Coe, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rishobora gukurikizako igisata co kwoga, mu kubuza abagore biyumva nk'abagabo kuja mw'ihiganwa, avuga ashimitse ko "kutarenganya bidashobora guharirwako". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tubandanya twiga, tugira ubushakashatsi ku bwinshi bw'inkabuzo ya testostérone ko ari kimwe mu bituma umuntu akomera gusumba , tukaba twarategekanije ibiganiro ku mategeko yacu mu kanama kacu mu mpera y'umwaka." Semenya, yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu ku metero 800 mu myaka ya 2012 na 2016 mu nkino za olempike, yari yunguruje ku ngingo zafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi, ariko aratsindwa muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino mu 2019. Yaratsinzwe kandi muri sentare y'iyungururizo no muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu mwaka wakurikiye, imbere yo kwitura sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu aho urwo rubanza rutarumvirizwa. Yagize ati: "Ntituzigera duhagarika uru rugamba." "Ubu ibi ntibiraba jewe gusa, biraba abana bakiri bato ubu bariko baravuka bazohangana n'iki kibazo. "Hari abana benshi bipfuza guhiganwa ku metero 400, 800 na 1500, ariko ntibashobora kubemerera. Bavuga ko siporo ari iya bose, ariko ubu si iya bose."
